title: Write the Equation in Standard Form
Determine Whether the Major Axis is Horizontal or Vertical
text: Since $$25<36$$ and $$36$$ is in the $$y^2$$ term, the major axis is vertical.

title: Find the endpoints of the major axis.
text: The endpoints will be the y-intercept. Since $$b^2=36$$ then $$b=-6$$ or $$b=6$$. The endpoint of the major axis are $$(0,6)$$, $$(0,-6)$$.

title: Find the endpoints of the minor axis.
text: The endpoints will be the x-intercepts. Since $$a^2=25$$, then $$a=-5$$ or $$a=5$$. The endpoints of the minor axis are $$(5,0)$$, $$(-5,0)$$.

title: Elimination of Choices
text: SInce graph $$3$$ is the only graph with y-intercepts as $$(0,6)$$ and $$(0,-6)$$ and x-intercept as $$(5,0)$$, $$(-5,0)$$, graph $$3$$ is the final answer.
